alert.note: Alert for Butts; Henry; Jasper; Newton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 10:44PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Henry, northeastern Butts, northwestern Jasper and southern Newton Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1044 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over North Alcovy, or 10 miles south of Covington. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Stewart, Eudora, Turtle Cove, Ola, Worthville, North Alcovy, Fincherville, Stark and Rocky Plains. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
